name: Detail - Set out design features as per For Construction drawings (Cast in items, Ducting, Penetrations)
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Construction Drawing
Detail - Delivery Dockets are collected and signed before precast materials are removed from the truck

Detail - Any damage to precast materials is to be assessed, returned to the manufacturer if not compliant or remedial work to be done by the manufacturer onsite & an OFI to be completed

Detail - All Steel brackets, bolts/nuts & steel wire ropes must be inspected on delivery. Any damaged items shall be isolated, repaired or replaced
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection, Document review

Conformance Criteria - Comply with AS/NZS 5131. Brackets will be manufactured from 16mm thick 300 grade steel plate. Steel wire ropes shall be 20mm in diametre. Any welding required to be approved in writing by CPS Engineer
Records - Photo's, CPS COR Report, Manufacturer Test Certificates, Welding tickets
Detail - Approved methodology for the lift is followed by all site crews and any variation from the original plan is documented at the pre-start/OFI
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review, Visual inspection
Detail - Precast Components are to be installed in accordance with the design/drawing. Each unit is to be butted tightly against the adjacent unit to present a coherent mass
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - The position of the dolos groynes will be set out and agreed to with the CPS Engineer
Detail - Dolosse’s will be secured in position using 20mm diameter steel wire ropes passed through the lifting eyes of the Dolosse’s and secured to brackets welded onto the existing sheet pile wall.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - As per design/drawings. Welding to be inspected and be approved in writing by CPS Engineer
Records - Photo's, CPS COR Report, Welding tickets
Detail - Ensure cut/fill slopes comply with design prior to next process taking place
Frequency - Prior to placing topsoil/pavement/ finished surfaces

Conformance Criteria - As-built Survey & Drawing Mark-Ups to be reviewed and accepted by CPS Engineer

name: Detail - Set out extents and check against design drawings
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey
Conformance Criteria - Consistency with Construction Drawing
Detail - Geotextile filter fabric to be compliant with Bidim A49 or similar approved
Frequency - Prior to commencement of placement
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document review
Conformance Criteria - The material shall be non-woven geotextile and comply with TNZ F/7: 2003 meeting filtration class 1, strength class E requirements.
Detail - Rock Armouring Construction Material compliant with Rock Rip Rap Grading tableas per Typical Sections Views sheet S03 Rev 1
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing, Visual inspection

Conformance Criteria - 100% smaller than 2400Kg, 20% greater than 1000Kgs,50% greater than 600kgs 80% greater than 175Kgs. Stone shape shall be as close as possible to cubical. Long, thin, slabby shapes are unacceptable.
Detail - Filter fabric shall be placed under rock and against the end faces of the excavation as per design/drawings
Frequency - Prior to placing rock fill
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - Placement of fabric shall be as per design shown on Typical Sections Views sheet S03 Rev 1 and be laid/overlapped as per manufacturers recommendations
Detail - The Contractor shall take care not to damage the fabric during installation. Any tears shall be repaired at the Contractors expense by placing additional fabric over the damaged area
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - tears shall be repaired by contractor

Detail - Ensure that rock material is placed in such a manner to minimise segregation. Rock is not to be end dumped or allowed to fall from an appreciable height. Oversize rock to be placed such to minimise voids. CPS Engineer given notice to visually inspect initial placement of riprap material
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Conformance Criteria - As per design/drawings. Rock toe construction to be sighted and approved by CPS Engineer
Detail - Ensure cut/fill slopes comply with design prior to next process taking place
Frequency - Prior to placing topsoil/pavement/ finished surfaces
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Survey / Drawings
Conformance Criteria - As-built Survey & Drawing Mark-Ups to be reviewed and accepted by CPS Engineer
